mission.title: Continuum Mission
mission.description: Use Immortalized Crew to ensure the Continuum stays on the correct path. (Placeholder)

potential_rewards.name: Quantum Energy
potential_rewards.flavor: Quantum--a mortal term for Q energy--is needed in order to retrieve crew. Quantum will regenerate over time, but the Q can only hold so much at a time. Plan your crew retrieval operations in order to make efficient use of this resource. Quantum can be regenerated instantly in exchange for Dilithium.

potential_rewards.name: Dilithium
potential_rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

potential_rewards.name: Archer
potential_rewards.flavor: Archer's beloved dog Porthos is seriously ill. To save his friend, Archer is ready to do anything, even assist during an operation.

action.name: My Only Concern Right Now Is Porthos

quests.name: A Singular Occurrence
quests.description: The Cytherians will try and repair the timelines via a controlled singularity. Monitor their progress and react quickly if anything goes wrong.

reward.name: Diplomacy Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Right of Conquest
quests.description: Gowron has escaped with the artifacts of Kahless and plans to use them in a risky bid to usurp the throne. He must be stopped.

reward.name: Medicine Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Pillage and Plunder
quests.description: The Augments have raided the temporally restored House of Duras and kidnapped B'Etor! Help her sister Lursa stop them.

challenges.name: Stalk Augments and Ambush at Shuttle

quests.name: Iconian Insider
quests.description: Determine how the rogue archaeologist Vash is able to steal priceless artifacts without getting caught, and put a stop to it.

stages.text: Gain Access to Romulan Neutral Zone

challenges.name: Use Data to Model Vash's Location
